div.p: 1. Device A creates an ICMPv6 NS message (Type 135) which includes Target IP and Src MAC(Optional)
IPv6 header: - src IP of device A and dest IP of B's multicast IPv6

switch.text: 1. Device A creates an ICMPv6 NS mess...

div.p: 1. Target NICs in that multicast IP group receives packet. Other devices with different addresses ignore this packet (they don't listen to this IPv6 multicast group).

switch.text: 1. Target NICs in that multicast IP group receives packet. Oth...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2060px; margin-left: 211px;

div.p: 2. Then all these NIC will use the multicast MAC address because NICs understand MAC addresses, not IP addresses and check that multicast MAC address in there MAC filter

switch.text: 2. Then all these NIC will use the multicast MAC address becau...
